point(pos)[source]

Return a point on the map.

DO NOT directly modify the point type to PointType.FOOD and vice versa. Use {add|rm}_food() methods instead.

Parameters:

pos (base.pos.Pos) – The position of the point to be fetched

Returns:

The point at the given position.

Return type:

snake.point.Point

snake.base.pos module

class snake.base.pos.Pos(x=0, y=0)[source]

Bases: object

Integer coordinate in 2D plane.

The origin of the coordinate system is at the top-left corner, with x-axis extends downward and y-axis extends rightward.

adj(direc)[source]

Return the adjacent Pos in a given direction.

all_adj()[source]

Return a list of all the adjacent Pos.

direc_to(adj_pos)[source]

Return the direction of an adjacent Pos relative to self.
